ygData.subject: New subject - Group level limits
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, I would like to impart with some knowledge I have gleamed tonight. I, a level 10 Enchanter, was grouped with 2 level 16 friends and a level 14.....and I
ygData.messageBody:
Hail,
I would like to impart with some knowledge I have gleamed tonight.
I, a level 10 Enchanter, was grouped with 2 level 16 friends and a level
14.....and I was GAINING EXP!!!! woohoo, yeehaa and all that. Please post
if there are other out there with similar experiences, i was under the
impression that there was a 5 level limit on this, starting at level 5 ( 3
for under that ), does anyone know the true cap for this, or is this a bug i
should not exploit?

Tovan
Rathe lake server
Felwithe Enchanter
